1370: Bodekine moved to Den Hof.D.1 after marriage.
Got married to Jute at age 19 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Jute, Jute, at age 19.
1371: Had a son with Jute, Rutgerus, at age 20.
1374: Had a son with Jute, Franco, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Jute, Moerseil, at age 24.
1377: Had a daughter with Jute, Hodine, at age 26.
Became caretaker of Jute, Rutgerus, Franco, Moerseil, Hodine at age 27.
1379: Lost daughter Hodine when Hodine was 3 years old.
1380: Lost daughter Moerseil when Moerseil was 6 years old.
